title: 1.4 TF2: Frames & Transformations
description: Building upon our understanding of URDF for describing a robot's physical structure, this chapter introduces TF2 â€“ the ROS 2 framework for managing coordinate frames and transformations. In robotics, especially with complex humanoid systems, understanding where the robot is in its environment, where its sensors are relative to its body, and how its end-effectors move, all depend on accurate spatial relationships. TF2 provides a powerful, standardized way to keep track of these relationships over time.
